snippet: The office of the Committee Against Torture, which has been investigating the practice of punitive house burning in Chechnya, was itself destroyed.
abstract: Office of human rights group Committee Against Torture is burned down in apparent arson in Grozny, Chechnya; group had been investigating practice of so-called punitive house burning in Russia's Chechnya regions, in which homes of relatives of terrorist suspects are burned in response to major attacks.
lead_paragraph: The office of the Committee Against Torture, which has been investigating the practice of punitive house burning in Chechnya, was itself destroyed.
